mapper.sql: supplier_id, supplier_num, supplier_full_name, supplier_city, type, contacts, contacts_phone, status, create_by, update_by, create_date, update_date, isCommission, posPayFlag, cooperation_type, isTest, enterprise_type, address
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into car_biz_supplier
supplier_full_name,
supplier_city,
contacts,
contacts_phone,
dispatcher_phone,
cooperation_type,
status,
supplier_type,
enterprise_type,
is_two_shifts,
address,
create_by,
update_by,

mapper.update:
update car_biz_supplier
supplier_full_name = #{supplierName},
supplier_city = #{supplierCity},
contacts = #{contacts},
contacts_phone = #{contactsPhone},
dispatcher_phone = #{dispatcherPhone},
cooperation_type = #{cooperationType},
status = #{status},
supplier_type = #{supplierType},
enterprise_type = #{enterpriseType},
is_two_shifts = #{isTwoShifts},
address = #{address},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_by = #{updateBy},
where supplier_id = #{supplierId}
mapper.select:
SELECT s.supplier_id AS supplierId, s.supplier_full_name AS supplierName, c.city_name AS cityName, s.`status` AS status, '0' as isExpireSoon FROM car_biz_supplier s LEFT JOIN car_biz_city c ON c.city_id = s.supplier_city WHERE
ORDER BY s.create_date DESC

SELECT c.city_name AS cityName, s.supplier_id AS supplierId, s.supplier_full_name AS supplierName, s.`status` AS status, s.contacts AS contacts, s.contacts_phone AS contactsPhone, s.dispatcher_phone AS dispatcherPhone, t.cooperation_name AS cooperationName FROM car_biz_supplier s LEFT JOIN car_biz_city c ON c.city_id = s.supplier_city LEFT JOIN car_biz_cooperation_type t ON t.id = s.cooperation_type WHERE

SELECT s.supplier_id AS supplierId, s.supplier_full_name AS supplierName, s.supplier_city AS supplierCity, c.city_name AS cityName, s.contacts AS contacts, s.contacts_phone AS contactsPhone, s.dispatcher_phone AS dispatcherPhone, s.cooperation_type AS cooperationType, s.`status` AS status FROM car_biz_supplier s LEFT JOIN car_biz_city c ON c.city_id = s.supplier_city WHERE s.supplier_type = 1 AND s.supplier_id = #{supplierId}

SELECT s.supplier_id AS supplierId, s.supplier_full_name AS supplierName, s.supplier_city AS supplierCity, c.city_name AS cityName, s.contacts AS contacts, s.contacts_phone AS contactsPhone, s.dispatcher_phone AS dispatcherPhone, s.cooperation_type AS cooperationType, s.`status` AS status FROM car_biz_supplier s LEFT JOIN car_biz_city c ON c.city_id = s.supplier_city WHERE s.supplier_type = 1 AND s.supplier_id in
#{item}

SELECT c.city_name AS cityName, s.supplier_full_name AS supplierName, s.contacts AS contacts, s.contacts_phone AS contactsPhone, s.dispatcher_phone AS dispatcherPhone, cp.cooperation_name AS cooperationName, CASE s.`status` WHEN 0 THEN "无效" WHEN 1 THEN "有效" ELSE "未知状态" END AS status, s.address AS address, CASE s.supplier_type WHEN 0 THEN "其他" WHEN 1 THEN "含巴士业务" ELSE "未知类型" END AS supplierType, CASE s.enterprise_type WHEN 1 THEN "是" WHEN 2 THEN "否" ELSE "未知类型" END AS enterpriseType, CASE s.is_two_shifts WHEN 0 THEN "单班" WHEN 1 THEN "双班" ELSE "未知类型" END AS isTwoShifts FROM car_biz_supplier s LEFT JOIN car_biz_city c ON c.city_id = s.supplier_city LEFT JOIN car_biz_cooperation_type cp ON cp.id = s.cooperation_type WHERE supplier_id = #{supplierId}
